answers.author: Dale Iman
answers.text:
We have adopted protocols that identify procedures for various levels of Council / staff communication.  These protocols are reviewd annually as part of our Strategic Planning Retreat to insure everyone is on the same page.

text: I am looking for examples of policies addressing communication between city staff and elected officials. Specifically, the procedures that need to be followed by both elected officials and staff members when communicating within their professional capacites.
title: Communication between staff and elected officials
